subject: Re: [junit] Re: HttpUnit group?
msgSnippet: There does not appear to be a Yahoo! group, but there are mailing lists. Google will help you find them, as will http://www.httpunit.org. I think the answer
messageBody:
There does not appear to be a Yahoo! group, but there are mailing
lists. Google will help you find them, as will http://www.httpunit.org

I think the answer was closer to, "Spend a little more time with
Google."

I agree that someone in an agitated state of mind might find it
gratuitously rude, but it seems common and accepted to point out when a
simple web search would find the answer.

In the specific case of the Yahoo! groups, though, if Google can't find
it, it definitely ain't there. :)

Good luck.

So said tsudonymn <tsudonymn@...> on 2003-01-08
--------------------

>So the answer is you don't know.
>
>
>
>
> And no, a search (albiet quick one) of google did not net any
>reference to such a group. Thus the question.
>

>
